title: sundhari sadhaa
sahitya:
sundari sadA nI pAdAravindamulaku nA vandanamE tripura



(sundari)







anupallavi







kandarpa janaka sOdari sharadindu nibhanana jenda malara vara



shiva 



(sundari)







caraNam







svAntamuna viSaya bhrAntuludigi ninna shAnta modalasu



vishrAntigala



vEdAntulakidu mukti kAntAmaNi mosagi kuntaLAmba rAghavanu



mosagidi 



(sundari)
